item.title: How to send sms using Aakash sms in Nepal using Laravel
item.description: Laravel AakashSms The sachinkiranti/aakash-sms package provides easy access to the api of Nepali Sms Service Provider called AakashSms. Installation Installation is straightforward, setup is similar to every other Laravel Packages. 1. Install via Composer Begin by pulling in the package through Composer: 1 composer require sachinkiranti/aakash-sms 2. Define the Service Provider and alias Note: This package supports the new auto discovery features of Laravel >=5.5, so if you are working on a Laravel >=5.
